definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: Has destroyed Argentina's 5 "the super colors" the attack airplane.
sentences.chinese: 砸毀了阿根廷的5架“超級軍旗”攻擊機。

sentences.english: Gasic thinks he's found the answer--in San Rafael, Argentina.
sentences.chinese: Gasic認爲他在阿根廷的聖拉菲爾找到了答案。

sentences.english: Residents also complain that Argentina hasn't given nature-based tourism a chance."If
sentences.chinese: 當地居民也抱怨阿根廷政府不肯給自然觀光業機會。

sentences.english: Argentina are the unknown package of this World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷是這屆世界盃上的一個未知數。

sentences.english: Argentina's trade balance with China swung into a deficit in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷對華貿易差額在2008年轉爲逆差。

sentences.english: SI Latino: Can Argentina win the Copa América again?
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷能再度贏得美洲盃嗎？

sentences.english: Because it is certain that Argentina doesn'thave the money to actually buy these.
sentences.chinese: 因爲很明顯，阿根廷沒那麼多錢買這些。

sentences.english: Neither, I am a big fan of Argentina. What is your favorite team?
sentences.chinese: 兩個都不支持，我是阿根廷隊的鐵桿球迷，你呢？

sentences.english: Argentina's coach Diego Maradona is perplexed in Cape Town.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷教練迪亞哥馬拉多納在開普敦賽場上充滿無奈。

sentences.english: Argentina coach Sergio Batista was no exception at this Copa America.
sentences.chinese: 本屆美洲盃，阿根廷主教練巴蒂斯塔也不例外。

sentences.english: China appreciates Argentina's adherence to the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 我們讚賞阿根廷政府堅持一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: These supercolonies, however, are only one aspect of L. humile's success.
sentences.chinese: 這些超級種羣僅僅是阿根廷螞蟻成功的一方面。

sentences.english: Maradona atoned by inspiring Argentina to win the next World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 馬拉多納通過激勵阿根廷獲得世界盃冠軍獲得了救贖。

sentences.english: The droughts are big, covering an area about the size of Argentina.
sentences.chinese: 這幾場乾旱範圍接近有阿根廷國土面積那麼大。

sentences.english: I am sure the guys and Argentine football will pull through.
sentences.chinese: 我肯定小夥子們和阿根廷足球可以渡過難關。

sentences.english: Argentina remains cut-off from international credit (see article).
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷保持國際信貸的削減。

definition: Côte d'Ivoire or Ivory Coast in West Africa
